name: anarchy-monorepo
author: S. Panfilov
description: Anarchy Monorepo - an infrastructure around Anarchy-Engine.

scripts.before:release: npm run --workspaces --if-present before:release && npm run generate:legal && npm run sanitize:all
scripts.clean:all: rimraf packages/**/package-lock.json -g packages/**/node_modules -g packages/**/dist -g apps/**/package-lock.json -g apps/**/node_modules -g  ./node_modules  ./package-lock.json
scripts.clean:all-metadate: npm run e2e:clean-metadate --workspace=apps/showcases-e2e && npm run sanitize-assets --workspace=apps/showcases-desktop ** npm run sanitize-assets --workspace=apps/showcases-core && npm run sanitize-assets --workspace=packages/showcases-menu
scripts.clean:all:restore: git add ./package-lock.json && find packages -type d -name node_modules -prune -false -o -type f -name package-lock.json -exec git add {} +
scripts.clean:reinstall: npm run clean:all && npm install && npm run clean:all:restore
scripts.generate:legal: npm run generate:legal:files && npm run generate:legal:sbom
scripts.generate:legal:all: npm run generate:legal && npm run generate:legal:anarchy-engine && npm run generate:legal:anarchy-i18n && npm run generate:legal:anarchy-legal && npm run generate:legal:anarchy-shared && npm run generate:legal:showcases-core && npm run generate:legal:showcases-desktop && npm run generate:legal:showcases-e2e && npm run generate:legal:showcases-menu && npm run generate:legal:showcases-shared
scripts.prettier:changed: git diff --name-only --diff-filter=ACMRTUXB HEAD | grep -E '\.(ts|tsx|js|json|css|md)$' | xargs prettier --write
